thread.title: Juncker’s Call for Restoring Ties With Russia 'in Line With EU Policy' - EC
thread.title_full: Juncker’s Call for Restoring Ties With Russia 'in Line With EU Policy' - EC - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Juncker’s Call for Restoring Ties With Russia 'in Line With EU Policy' - EC
text: Speaking in the southern German town of Passau on Thursday, Juncker stated that Russia should be treated decently, whereas Brussels must restore a "practical relationship" with Moscow as although the United States may have its own take on the matter, the European Union must prioritize its own interests. ...
